document_data.name: Toytere
document_data.mainbody: '''Toytere''' was a [[halfling]] and the leader of the [[Dead Rats]] gang of [[Luskan]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|1485}}
document_data.Description:
Toytere had a weasel-like face, a red beard, and sharpened teeth.{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|1457}} He carried a cane topped by a gold [[rat]].{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|1464}}

Like many of the Rats, Toytere had some [[wererat]] blood although he never demonstrated any ability to shapeshift until his death when his body took the form of a wererat.{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|4326}}
document_data.Abilities: Toytere had the Sight, which allowed him to see the future when in a trance.{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|2605}}
document_data.Relationships: He was the biological twin brother of [[Cellica]], who was the adopted sister of [[Kalen Dren]].{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|1490}} although he forgave Kalen before he died.
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1480}}, Toytere ordered the capture of the powerful [[spellscar|spellscarred]] [[wizard]] [[Myrin Darkdance]] with the intent of turning her over to the [[Coin Spinners]] gang for payment.{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|364}} Realizing they couldn't hold a mage as powerful as Myrin, they led her to believe she was the new leader of the gang.<ref>{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|?}}

Toytere was bitten by a rat infected with the [[Fury]] plague{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|2896}} and slowly began to develop symptoms of the disease, becoming increasingly aggressive and irrational. Later, Toytere and the Rats turned on Myrin and he was killed by [[Sithe]] during a brawl at the Rats' headquarters.{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|4299}}
